name: Crocheted Chains Necklace - Petrol Blue and Grey with Peridot
description:
One of a kind, crocheted necklace, with peridot.

Made from sterling silver chain, silk and round peridot beads.

Necklace is 18" long.

Comes in a jewellery box.

name: Crocheted Chains Necklace - Denim Blue with Pyrite
description:
One of a kind, crocheted necklace, with crochet fringe. 

Made from sterling silver chain, silk and square pyrite beads.

Necklace is 18" long.

Comes in a jewellery box.

name: Small Delicate Crochet Lace Pendant in Silver
description:
Unusual and delicate crochet lace pendant necklace. The inspiration for this necklace came from my interest in antique lace. They are much finer and more delicate than the modern lace and the craftsmanship is just amazing.

The pendant is about one inch big hanging on 18 inches long sterling silver delicate chain.

The silver colored pendant is ready to ship within three days, but if you would like this necklace in different color please allow about two weeks for delivery.

name: Crocheted Chains Necklace - Rust and Gold
description:
Another one of a kind crocheted necklace from my new collection of Chain Reaction. Crocheted silver chains and silk in rust and peach make this necklace so unusual but also very elegant and modern.

The necklace is 18 inches in total and the crochet part is about 4.5 inches long.

*Sterling silver chains and fittings
*Silk

Please remember that this item can be made in different colors but it may not have the exact look.

name: Square Crochet Chains and Rough Diamond Necklace
description:
One of a kind necklace with crocheted brass chain square, sterling silver chain and tiny diamonds attached on a gold vermeil pins. It makes a unique and original present. Perfect for a special occasion.

Length 20 inches, size of the square 1 by 0.5 inches.

The necklace comes in a jewellery box.

name: Flower Falls Crochet Earrings in Peach
description:
Earrings that look like real flower falls, made with delicate, but durable cotton yarn and beautiful glass seed beads.

Ear wires and jump rings are sterling silver.

The earrings are about 3 inches long.

They can be made in custom color combination, please ask for details.

name: Crochet Necklace With Five Copper Discs
description:
One of a kind crocheted silver chain and silk necklace with handmade enameled copper discs. The necklace is 18 inches long and has metal silver colored button for fastening.

It comes in a jewellery box.

name: Black Dreamcatcher Lace Earrings
description:
Delicate, whimsical lacy earrings, made from the black metallic thread and glass beads, sun-catching and unique.

40mm in diameter

silver ear-wires, silver plated hoops
glass beads, metallic thread

name: Crochet Chains Labradorite Necklace
description:
One of a kind necklace, crocheted with sterling silver chain, silks and labradorite stones. It is different and perfect for special occasions, labradorite has a lovely, green/blue flash to it when lit and is known as a magical stone (sometime called as dark side of the moon) it helps to show what is hidden, strengthen the weakness and slows the anger.

Size - this necklace is 18"

Materials - sterling silver chain, sterling silver button, silk, labradorite stones

Comes in a jewellery box

name: Crocheted Chains Necklace - Pink and Gold
description:
Another one of a kind crocheted necklace from my new collection of Chain Reaction. Crocheted silver chains and silk in hot pink make this necklace so unusual but also very elegant and modern.

The necklace is 18 inches in total and the crochet part is about 3.5 inches long.

*Sterling silver chains and fittings 
*Silk

Please remember that this item can be made in different colors but it may not have the exact look.

name: Small Crochet Flower Earrings in Grey and Cream
description:
Smaller crocheted earrings with the beaded flowers. They can also be made in different color combination.

They measure about 2 inches with the ear wire.

Materials: sterling silver, glass beads, mercerized cotton

name: Delicate Crochet Flower Bracelet Choose Your Color
description:
Short version of my bracelet that is very long and can be wrapped around the wrist few times. This one has got a sterling silver bolt clasp and is a very sweet fine addition to any Spring and Summer everyday outfit.

Will make a perfect gift for a friend, sister or mum. Can be ordered in bigger number and given to your bridesmaids as wedding favor.

It is made in a standard size 6.5 inches (about 16.25cm) but if you like I can make it in any other size. There is also many other colors available. Please message me for details.

Thank you so much for stopping by :)

name: Delicate Lace Hoop Earrings - September
description:
These are the most delicate pieces of ear jewelry you could imagine, looking at their size you would thought that they are heavier, but they are really light.

This design is inspired by vintage patterns of crochet doilies and that is something I really enjoy making.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

They come in lovely jewelry box ready to be as a gift if needed.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always to help.

Thank you for visiting my shop.

name: Delicate Crochet Star Hoop Earrings in Grey and Pink
description:
Very striking and eye catching, one of a kind piece of jewellery, perfect for Summer and holiday. Hand crocheted lace in funky colors. They are very light and delicate, colorful and happy.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

They come in a small jewelry box ready to be given as a gift if needed.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always happy to help.

name: Dreamcatcher Lace Necklace
description:
That is the new look for my favorite design - Delicate Crochet Lace. Wear the lace as a most unique jewellery piece - delicate and light. With glass beads and most intricate lace pattern.

The findings are silver plated and the chain and clasp are silver. The necklace is 18" long.

There are three color options available for sale: gold, copper and black.

*metallic thread
*glass beads
*silver plated hoops, 40mm hoop
*sterling silver findings

name: Small Crochet Cuff with Vintage Buckle in Black
description:
The coolest way of wearing lace is now available in my shop. Soft cotton crochet cuff featuring this pretty vintage buckle.

Lace is my first and biggest inspiration, always beautiful and intricate. This is the cuff made and designed by me playing with old lace patterns. I also started collecting vintage buckles for their uniqueness.

This item is now only made to order. Can be made in any color you like and also it can be made longer as a belt.

name: Triangular Crochet Shawl - Rainbow
description:
Beautiful colored triangular crochet shawl. 

Materials:
75% wool, 25% nylon

Machine washable

name: Crochet Shawl In Gypsy Style in Crazy Fox
description:
Lovely triangular shawl in lacy pattern from a very soft and fine wool, very warm to keep you snuggle through cold days but light and airy not to feel uncomfortable. Bright and happy colors make this shawl perfect addition to dull Winter days.

Perfect as a gift for mother's day.

It is ready to ship.

The yarn contains:

75% Wool
25% Nylon

The longest side is about 56" and two shorter are about 38" long.

Hand wash, air dry only.

name: Small Delicate Crochet Lace Pendant in Red
description:
Unusual and delicate crochet lace pendant necklace. The inspiration for this necklace came from my interest in antique lace. They are much finer and more delicate than the modern lace and the craftsmanship is just amazing.

The pendant is about one inch big hanging on 18 inches long sterling silver round trace delicate chain.

The silver colored pendant is ready to ship within three days, but if you would like this necklace in different color please allow about two weeks for delivery.

name: Chunky Merino and Cashmere Fingerless Gloves Cream
description:
Get ready for cold days, soft, warm and chunky crochet fingerless mittens. They come in two sizes, medium and small but can also be ordered in larger size.

Wool contains:
55% Extra Fine Merino Wool
33% Acrylic
12% Cashmere

Hand wash only, no tumble drying, iron on low settings.

name: Chunky Merino and Cashmere Fingerless Gloves Petrol Blue
description:
Get ready for cold days, soft, warm and chunky crochet fingerless mittens. They come in two sizes, medium and small but can also be ordered in larger size.

Wool contains:
55% Extra Fine Merino Wool
33% Acrylic
12% Cashmere

name: Summer Wedding Lace Crochet Shrug
description:
This beautiful summer shrug, based on doily pattern is a great wedding shrug, perfect to cover your arms. It can also be made in any other color you like and be a perfect clothing for a hot summer day, but can also be worn under the casual shirt to give you a very original look.

It is light and airy and very pretty, has got lovely fitted shape to emphasize your feminine shape.

>>This item is made to your size.<<

I can crochet this top for you in any size and color you need, just contact me for details.

Thank you so much for visiting my shop.

name: Crochet Silk Bracelet With Pyrite
description:
One of a kind, organic bracelet with chunky pyrite stones and sterling silver button. The bracelet will fit wrist size between 6 and 7 inches. 

Materials:
pyrite, sterling silver, silk

If you would like similar piece but in a different colors, please don't hesitate to ask.

This bracelet comes in a jewellery box.

name: Small Delicate Crochet Lace Earrings in Yellow Gold
description:
Very unusual and very delicate crochet lace earrings. The inspiration for this jewellery came from my interest in antique lace. They are much finer and more delicate than the modern lace and the craftmanship is just amazing.
The earring hoop is about one inch in diameter and with the ear wire it is about 1.75 inches long.
This pair is ready to ship within 3 days, but if you would like this item in different color please allow about two weeks for delivery.

name: Blue Chalcedony Bracelet With Crochet Flowers
description:
This small blue chalcedony gold vermeil bezel bracelet with tiny chocolate brown crocheted flowers is perfect accessory for this Spring and Summer. Wear it during the day when sun comes out and the stone shines beautifully in its light or at night to adorn your evening outfit.

The bracelet is 6.5" which fits most wrists but it stretches slightly so it is better that it fits perfectly your wrist. It can be made bigger and smaller to your required size.

Materials:
blue chalcedony
gold vermeil bezel
sterling silver bolt ring
cotton

name: Vintage Lace Beaded Earrings
description:
Beautiful flower cut out of vintage piece of lacy trim. Small earrings with glass beads.

Materials: vintage lace, brass findings, glass beads

The earrings are about 1.75 inches long with the ear wire.

They come in a recycled paper jewellery box.

name: Black Crochet Cuff with Vintage Metal Buckle
description:
One of a kind, unique crochet cuff, featuring beautiful pineapple pattern. With the very nice ornament - buckle makes a perfect finishing touch for the rocker girl style.

The bracelet is in one size and it adjustable.

name: Small Delicate Crochet Lace Earrings in Red
description:

The earring hoop is about one inch in diameter and with the ear wire it is about 1.75 inches long.

The red pair is ready to ship within 3 days, but if you would like this item in different color please allow about two weeks for delivery.

The silver colored pendant is ready to ship within 3 days, but if you would like this necklace in different color please allow about two weeks for delivery.

description:
Beautiful and unique, handcrafted flowery wedding necklace, made with silk, cotton, sterling silver and glass beads. Mass of flowers, like a waterfall, dreamy and nostalgic.

This necklace is 22 inches (56 cm) long, fastened with sterling silver button. Comes in a box.

It can also be made in your chosen colors, please ask for details.

name: Delicate Crochet Star Hoop Earrings in Orange and Brown
description:
Very striking and eye catching, one of a kind piece of jewellery, perfect for Summer and holiday. Hand crocheted lace in funky colors with beaded feature. They are very light and delicate, colorful and happy.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always happy to help.

name: Extra Long Crochet Flower Beaded Necklace in Burgundy
description:
This necklace is a very long, but delicate piece with petite crochet flowers with beads as petals. It is about 50 inches long and has sterling silver bolt ring clasp as fastening.

It is so versatile that it can also be worn as a bracelet, wrapped around the wrist 6 to seven times.

Made with mercerized cotton yarn, frosted glass seed beads and sterling silver fastening, comes in a jewellery box.

If you would like this necklace in other color, please don't hesitate and ask, I am happy to help.

name: Stick Earrings With Gold Plated Globe and Amazonite
description:
Unique combination of semi-precious stones: orange amazonite, square tiger's eye, gold plated stardust globe and two jadeite squares.

Earrings measure about 1.5 inches with the ear wires.

Oxidized sterling silver ear wires.
Silver and silver plated findings.

Earrings come in jewellery box.

name: Flower Falls Crochet Earrings in Maroon and Grey
description:
Earrings that look like real flower falls, made with delicate, but durable cotton yarn and beautiful frosted glass seed beads.

Ear wires and jump rings are sterling silver.

The earrings are about 2.25 inches long.

They can be made in custom color combination, please ask for details.

name: Delicate Lace Hoop Earrings in Candy Colors
description:
These are the most delicate pieces of ear jewelry you could wear, looking at their size you would think that they are heavier, but they are not.

These earrings are so light and delicate, they make perfect addition to feminine style, crocheted with a finest hook from very fine cotton, beautiful and unique, just the perfect gift to woman of your life.

This design is inspired by vintage patterns of crochet doilies and that is something I really enjoy making.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

They come in lovely jewelry box ready to be as a gift if needed.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always to help.

Thank you for visiting my shop.

description:
Beautiful flower cut out of vintage piece of lacy trim. Small earrings with glass beads.

Materials: vintage lace, brass findings, glass beads

The earrings are about 2 inches long with the ear wire.

They come in a recycled paper jewellery box.

name: Peridot Bracelet With Crochet Flowers
description:
This small peridot gold vermeil bezel bracelet with tiny crocheted flowers is perfect accessory for this Spring and Summer. Wear it during the day when sun comes out and the stone shines beautifully in its light or at night to adorn your evening outfit.

The bracelet is 6.5" which fits most wrists but it stretches slightly so it is better that it fits perfectly your wrist. It can be made bigger and smaller to your required size.

peridot
gold vermeil bezel

name: Oval Labradorite and Silver Crochet Necklace
description:
One of a kind crocheted necklace from my new collection of Crocheted Shapes. Oval shaped crocheted silver and silk in mellow peach necklace makes a still impression.

The necklace is 20 inches in total and the crochet pendant is about 2 inches big.

Please remember that this item can be made in different colors but it may not have the same look.

name: Crochet Rose Gold Plated, Silver and Silk Necklace With Aventurine
description:
Rose gold plated chain and soft but durable silk yarn is crocheted to make this necklace. Dangling aventurine beads make such an amazing effect of movement. Wear this necklace as a casual and everyday addition, perfect for boho and gypsy style.

The size is about 22 inches long.

The necklace comes in a jewellery box.

name: Delicate Crochet Flower Bracelet or Necklace in Maroon
description:
This necklace is crocheted from mercerized cotton thread in elegant maroon color, can also be worn as a bracelet - if you wrap it around your neck three times or around your wrist about seven to eight times.

This is very delicate and fine work and has tiny flowers with leaves as a pattern.

This item can be made to your order: if you would like it in different color, please send me a message first with your requirements. It may take up to two weeks before delivery if a custom request has been made, when shipped tracking info is sent to you as well and then you should receive your item within 4 - 6 days from the shipping date.

name: Emerald Green Dreamcatcher Lace Earrings
description:
Delicate, whimsical lacy earrings, made from the green metallic thread and glass beads, sun-catching and unique.

40mm in diameter

silver ear-wires, silver plated hoops
glass beads, metallic thread

name: Delicate Crochet Lace Earrings
description:
The most delicate crocheted earrings, light and shiny, unique lace pattern crocheted on silver plated hoops. Very unique and very elegant. Gold, but can be made in silver, black or red thread.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the silver ear-wire.

They come in lovely jewelry box ready to be as a gift if needed.

name: Delicate Crochet Flower Bracelet or Necklace
description:
This necklace is crocheted from mercerized cotton thread in your chosen color, can be worn as a bracelet as well - wrap it around your neck three times or around your wrist seven times...

This is very delicate and fine work and has tiny flowers with leaves as a pattern.

This item is made to your order only and can be ordered in any color, please specify your requirements when purchasing. It may take up to two weeks before delivery, when shipped tracking info is sent to you as well and then you should receive your item within 4 - 6 days from the shipping date.

name: Pattern Only (PDF File) - Chunky Merino and Cashmere Fingerless Gloves
description:
Get ready for cold days, soft, warm and chunky crochet fingerless mittens. Make them yourself or give the pattern to your grandma. 

They can be made in two sizes, medium and small but can also try to make them larger.

Level: INTERMEDIATE/ADVANCED
What you need:

*	50g aran soft merino blend yarn, my favourite is Cashmerino Aran by Debbie Bliss (55% merino, 33% microfibre, 12% cashmere),
*	crochet hook 4mm, 4.5mm or 5mm
*	darning needle


This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours, after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.

I hope you enjoy making your mittens.

name: Vintage Lace Earrings with Honey Brown Beads
description:
Beautiful flower cut out of vintage piece of lacy trim. Small earrings with glass beads.

Materials: vintage lace, brass findings, glass beads

The earrings are about 2 inches long with the ear wire.

They come in a recycled paper jewellery box.

name: Multi-colored Flower Necklace
description:
Crochet flowers in beautiful color combination of pinks, blues and green and orange, made into this amazing necklace. The necklace is an experiment in mixing together metal and cotton and modern with nature loving soul.

The necklace can be reproduced in similar colors, but I can make the flowers in colors chosen by you so if you like that style please feel free to ask.

Standard size is 18 inches. Metal is antiqued brass.

name: Crochet Shawl In Gypsy Style in Maple Leaves
description:
Lovely triangular shawl in lacy pattern from a very soft and fine wool, very warm to keep you snuggle through cold days but light and airy not to feel uncomfortable. The color is a very organic and autumn like mix, reminds me of maple leaves falling from trees when summer ends.

Perfect as a gift for mother's day.

It is ready to ship.

The yarn contains:

75% Wool
25% Nylon

The longest side is about 56" and two shorter are about 38" long

Hand wash, air dry only.

name: Crocheted Chains Necklace - Coral
description:
One of a kind crocheted necklace from my new collection of Crocheted Shapes. Crocheted silver chains and silk in red coral make this necklace so unusual but also very elegant and modern.

The necklace is 20 inches in total and the crochet part is about 5 inches long.

*Sterling silver chains and fittings
*Silk

Please remember that this item can be made in different colors but it may not have the same look.

name: Crochet Cuff with Vintage Buckle in Red
description:
The coolest way of wearing lace is now available in my shop. Soft cotton crochet cuff featuring this pretty vintage buckle.

Lace is my first and biggest inspiration, always beautiful and intricate. This is the cuff made and designed by me playing with old lace patterns. I also started collecting vintage buckles for their uniqueness.

This item is now only made to order. Can be made in any color you like and also it can be made longer as a belt.

name: Edgy Baby Slippers
description:
Beautiful handmade 100% pure cotton baby slippers. They have tiny wooden button attached for fastening.

Sizes available
newborn
0 - 3 months
3 - 6 months
6 - 9 months

Please let me know what size would you like and what color is your first choice (for the body of the slipper) and second choice - this will be the edge of the slipper. Do not hesitate to contact me if you like them in any other color.

Please remember also that the button is attached really firmly but can always cause a hazard for the baby so it cannot be left on his own. If you'd like I can make them without the button with strings attached for fastening.

name: Elegant Crochet Baby Booties
description:
Very cute, hand crocheted baby booties, made with cotton and acrylic blend yarn with wooden button. 

The booties can be made in four sizes:
newborn
0 - 3 months
3 - 6 months
6 - 9 months

Please let me know what size would you like and what color is your first choice (for the body of the slipper) and second choice - this will be the sole of the slipper. Do not hesitate to contact me if you like them in any other color.

Please remember also that the button is attached really firmly but can always cause a hazard for the baby so it cannot be left on his own. If you'd like I can make them without the button with strings attached for fastening.

name: Flower Fall Crocheted And Beaded Necklace in Grey
description:
Beautiful and unique, handcrafted flowery wedding necklace, made with silk, cotton, sterling silver and glass beads. Mass of flowers, like a waterfall, dreamy and nostalgic. 

This necklace is 22 inches (56 cm) long, fastened with sterling silver button. Comes in a box.

This piece is ready to ship within 24 hours.

It can also be made in your chosen colors, please ask for details.

name: Stick Earrings With Gold Plated Globe
description:
Unique combination of semi-precious stones: black tourmaline, square jasper, gold plated stardust globe and two jadeite squares.

Earrings measure about 1.5 inches with the ear wires.

Oxidized sterling silver ear wires.
Silver and silver plated findings.

Earrings come in jewellery box.

name: Stick Earrings With Gold Plated Globe and Green Tourmaline
description:
Unique combination of semi-precious stones: sand jasper, gold plated stardust globe, green tourmaline and two jadeite squares.

Earrings measure about 1.5 inches with the ear wires.

Oxidized sterling silver ear wires.
Silver and silver plated findings.

Earrings come in jewellery box.

name: Long Crochet Necklace with Aventurine
description:
Necklace crocheted with brass chain and silk yarn, adorned with green aventurine beads. Crocheted part is made with brass chain and the neck part is sterling silver chain.

Length of the necklace - about 38 inches.

The necklace comes in a jewellery box.

name: PATTERN ONLY (PDF File) - Romantic Fingerless Mittens
description:
This is a pattern to make fingerless gloves, designed by me and never published before. This could make a perfect accessory for a wedding. Make it in color and add something pretty to your outfit!

Level: ADVANCED
What you need:

* not more than 100g, 4ply soft yarn (merino wool blend)
* crochet hook 3.75mm
* darning needle

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours, after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.

I hope you enjoy making your mittens.

name: Tooth Fairy Mouse
description:
I was asked to make a tiny crochet mouse for a girl in France, she lost her tooth and in France there is a Mouse Tooth Fairy bringing present when the child looses his tooth... but I find that this tiny mouse can also make a great gift for your cat.

Usually I make them from the acrylic and wool blend and stuff them with polyester fiberfill. The eyes are safety toy eyes.

This is not a toy for a child under 6 years old as there still are little bits that can be swallowed.

It is about two inches (5 cm) long and three inches (8.5 cm) with its tale.

This item is only made to order, but it will be shipped within one week after ordering.

name: PATTERN ONLY (PDF File) - Boho Barefoot Crochet Sandals
description:
This is a pattern to make crochet barefoot sandals, designed by me and never published before. You need four colors to make them, and best is if there are two darker colors and two lighter colors. This could make a perfect accessory to a wedding on the beach, or sand where you don't want to wear any heels or absolutely nothing on your feet. Make it without the change of color and it can make a perfect accessory for a beach wedding!

Level: INTERMEDIATE TO ADVANCED
What you need:

* not more than 50g
* 4ply stranded cotton yarn (embroidery floss) or stranded silk, or cotton thread size 3
* two medium beads (optional),
* crochet hook 1.75mm
* darning needle

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours, after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.

Have any questions? Contact the shop owner.

name: Granny Square Crochet Lap Blanket - MADE TO ORDER
description:
So soft and warm, traditional granny square blanket perfect to cover with when watching late evening film or reading the book in the garden when the afternoon is a bit cold. The colors I chose are natural and soft, pastel shades to make you feel even more cozy.

I use merino wool and cotton blend for my blankets but if you like I can make it in soft acrylic too. Please contact me first because the price will be lower in that option.

The blanket will be approximately 35" by 55" but it can be bigger or smaller if needed.

If you would rather like different colors please do not hesitate to contact me for more details.

Please allow up to 4 weeks for completion and shipping your order.

name: Tribal Crochet Hoop Earings Pink, Green and Blue
description:
Crocheted silk hoop earrings in contrasting colors with blue frosted glass beads. The color combination and dangle beads gives some tribal feel to the style.

Materials: silk, cotton, brass ear wires, brass findings, glass beads

The earrings are about 2.75 inches long with the ear wire, the hoop itself is about an inch in diameter.

They come in a recycled paper jewellery box.

name: Crochet Shawl In Gypsy Style - Tropical Fish
description:
Lovely triangular shawl in a fillet lace pattern from a very soft and fine wool, very warm to keep you snuggle through cold days but light and airy at the same time. The colors make a very bright and happy combination, definitely perfect for dull Winter days. You can order a custom pair of fingerless mittens too.

Perfect as a gift for mother's day.

It is ready to ship.

The yarn contains:

75% Wool
25% Nylon

The longest side is about 56" and two shorter are about 38" long

Hand wash, air dry only.

name: Multi-colored Flower Necklace Blue and Purple
description:
Crochet flowers in beautiful color combination of pinks, blues and green, made into this amazing necklace. The necklace is an experiment in mixing together metal and cotton and modern with nature loving soul.

***This item is only made to order***

The necklace can be reproduced in similar colors, but I can make the flowers in colors chosen by you so if you like that style please feel free to ask.

Standard size is 18 inches. Metal is antiqued brass.

name: Crochet Silver and Silk Necklace With Tourmaline
description:
Sterling silver chain and soft but durable silk yarn is crocheted to make this necklace. Dangling tourmaline beads make such an amazing effect of movement. Wear this necklace as a casual and everyday addition, perfect for boho and gypsy style.

The necklace is about 22 inches long.

It comes in a jewellery box.

name: PATTERN ONLY (PDF File) - Triangular Crochet Shawl In Gypsy Style
description:
Lovely triangular wrap in lacy pattern from a very soft and fine wool yarn, warm to keep you fit through cold days but light and airy not to feel uncomfortable. The colors make lovely stripey pattern. Can be made bit bigger or smaller, easily made with finer or chunkier yarn, just change the hook accordingly to your yarn, it will always fit :)

Perfect accessory for an artistic soul and perfect as a gift.

This pattern is for advanced crocheters and it is written in American English terms. There is no diagram but helpful tips and photos too.

It can be made in any self patterning yarn and it will always look great.

The yarn I used contains:

75% Wool
25% Nylon

The longest side is about 56" and two shorter are about 38" long

Hand wash, air dry

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours, after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.


Thank you for visiting!

name: Delicate Crochet Flower Bracelet
description:
This bracelet or necklace is crocheted from mercerized cotton thread in your chosen color, can be worn as a bracelet as well - wrap it around your neck three times or around your wrist seven times...

This is very delicate and fine work and has tiny flowers with leaves as a pattern.

This item is made to your order only and can be ordered in any color, please specify your requirements when purchasing. It may take up to two weeks before delivery, when shipped tracking info is sent to you as well and then you should receive your item within 4 - 6 days from the shipping date.

name: Delicate Lace Hoop Earrings in Ecru
description:
These are the most delicate pieces of ear jewelry you could wear, looking at their size you would thought that they are heavier, but they are not.

These earrings are so light and delicate, they make perfect addition to feminine style, crocheted with a finest hook from very fine cotton, beautiful and unique, just the perfect gift to woman of your life.

This design is inspired by vintage patterns of crochet doilies and that is something I really enjoy making.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

They come in lovely jewelry box ready to be as a gift if needed.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always to help.

Thank you for visiting my shop.

name: Cozy Crochet Fingerless Mittens in Denim Blue
description:
Beautiful fingerless mittens made with supersoft merino wool and cashmere blend, the stitch is very intricate and makes the mittens very comfortable and flexible. Elegant and and simple design makes them perfect for everyday wear, but also great for an evening out.

Soft merino yarn 55%, microfibre 33% and cashmere 12%, mohair edge. Please hand wash only, use a conditioner and lay flat to dry.

They are usually in one size to fit average size hand, but can be made much smaller or bigger.

THIS PAIR IS READY TO SHIP WITHIN 5 DAYS FROM THE PURCHASE

Thank you for stopping by

name: Lacy Crochet Coasters - Set of Four
description:
Beautiful lacy cotton coasters to prevent your table from damage, they are very decorative and give your place a warm and country feeling.

Crocheted from lovely soft 100% cotton haze in natural color. There is also purple shade available to order.

This listing is for four doily coasters.

name: Wedding Night Lacy Crochet Knickers
description:
Thinking of the special underwear for that special occasion? These bridal hand crocheted lacy underwear might be the one thing you you don't want to miss. They can be made in any color you like, with or without tiny seed beads in a delicate and soft cotton thread. Lingerie not only for wedding night, pretty and frilly, for ladies and girls.

Materials:
soft cotton, tiny glass beads

They are tied up, but can be made with elastic band.

Please contact with the required size and color after placing the order.

name: Long Lacy Opera Gloves - MADE TO ORDER
description:
Really long, 22 inches, crochet lace fingerless gloves, one of my very best designs, perfect for a night out in the Opera, elegant and intriguing. With a beautiful pineapple pattern in the middle.

They are made from mercerized cotton yarn.

Gloves can also be made shorter or in any other other color, if you want them really tight or in bigger size that also can be arranged - all you need to do is contact me in the form below and tell me all your requirements.

Thank you for visiting!

name: PATTERN ONLY (PDF File) - Circles Barefoot Crochet Sandals
description:
This is a pattern to make crochet barefoot sandals, designed by me and never published before. This could make a perfect accessory to a wedding on the beach, or sand where you don't want to wear any heels or absolutely nothing on your feet. Make it in color and take it with you to a holiday to add something pretty to your outfit!

Level: INTERMEDIATE

What you need:

* not more than 60g
* 2ply soft cotton yarn,
* four plastic rings (one inch in diameter),
* crochet hook 2mm and 1.50mm
* darning needle

This pattern will be emailed to you, within 24 hours, after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.

I hope you enjoy making your sandals.

name: PATTERN ONLY (PDF File) - Barefoot Crochet Sandals
description:
This is a pattern to make crochet barefoot sandals, designed by me and never published before. This could make a perfect accessory to a wedding on the beach, or sand where you don't want to wear any heels or absolutely nothing on your feet. Make it in color and take it with you to a holiday to add something pretty to your outfit!

Level: INTERMEDIATE

What you need:

* not more than 40g
* 2ply soft cotton yarn, (size 5 works best)
* two medium beads (optional),
* crochet hook 2mm and 1.50mm
* darning needle

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours after we receive the payment confirmation.

You can now sell things made from my patterns anywhere you like if you wish to. I also offer after purchase support where if you can ask me any questions you have.

I hope you enjoy making your sandals.

name: Lace Bracelet in Antique Cream
description:
Handmade bracelet crocheted in very fine cotton yarn. Perfect accessory for elegant woman.
Lace is my first and biggest inspiration, always beautiful and intricate. This is the cuff made and designed by me playing with old lace patterns. It has plated hook and ring for fastening. The cuff will fit almost any size hand.

This item is ready to ship. but can also be made in any color you like.

name: Psychedelic Crochet Fingerless Mittens in Tropical Fish
description:
This pair of fingerless mittens is not only the most beautiful and eye-catching accessory to wear this Winter, this is the very warm and most comfortable thing you could find to keep your hands warm and cozy.

One size, fits almost all.

This pair is ready to ship within 5 working days.

75% virgin wool, 25% nylon

Can be machine washable on low degree settings, lay flat to dry, do not tumble dry, do not bleach, iron on lowest setting.

There are more colors available and the fun part is that the mittens are not suppose to match.

name: Lace Cuff with Vintage Buckle in Ecru
description:
The coolest way of wearing lace is now available in my shop. Soft cotton crochet cuff featuring this pretty vintage buckle.

Lace is my first and biggest inspiration, always beautiful and intricate. This is the cuff made and designed by me playing with old lace patterns. I also started collecting vintage buckles and thought that this pearl buckle will match perfectly to the lime green color of the cuff.

This item is now only made to order. Can be made in any color you like and also it can be made longer as a belt.

name: Delicate Crochet Flower Bracelet or Necklace With Beads
description:
This necklace is crocheted from mercerized cotton thread in your chosen color, can be worn as a bracelet as well - wrap it around your neck three times or around your wrist seven times...

This is very delicate and fine work and has tiny flowers with leaves as a pattern. It is also adorned with tiny glass beads to make it more special. 

Perfect as a wedding jewellery, bridesmaids jewellery, wedding keepsake jewellery, can be a necklace or a friendship wrap bracelet, daisy chain crochet bracelet, delicate lace flowers and more...

This item is made to your order only and can be ordered in any color, please specify your requirements when purchasing. It may take up to two weeks before delivery, when shipped tracking info is sent to you as well and then you should receive your item within 4 - 6 days from the shipping date.

This design is inspired by vintage patterns of crochet doilies and that is something I really enjoy making.

The hoops are 1.5 inches (4 cm) in diameter
and are long 2.5 inches (6.5 cm) with the ear-wire.

If you would like some other colors, why not drop me a message below? Always to help.

Thank you for visiting my shop.

name: Flower Earrings with Gemstone Bead
description:
Ever wanted to wear flowers? With those flowery earrings in your ears you have something special and something precious, light and bright jewelry that makes you happy just looking at it.

They are crocheted with very fine cotton and my favorite crochet hook with added semiprecious stone. Have a precious flower and in any color you choose.

They are almost 2cm in diameter and 3.5cm long with earwires.

Please contact me if you like different color of the flower and what stone is your favorite and I will see how can I help you :)

Thank you so much for stopping by.

name: Tribal Crochet Hoop Earings Royal Blue, Peach and Green
description:
Crocheted silk hoop earrings in contrasting colors with green shiny glass beads. The color combination and dangle beads gives some tribal feel to the style.

Materials: silk, cotton, brass ear wires, brass findings, glass beads

The earrings are about 2.75 inches long with the ear wire, the hoop itself is about an inch in diameter.

They come in a recycled paper jewellery box.

name: Twisted Shawl in Creamy Wool Blend
description:
This amazing design makes that shawl something more than just cowl, it can easily be worn as a shrug over your arms, or just around your neck as a loose neck-warmer or wrapped twice around your neck as a cozy scarf.

Very light and soft cowl that is also incredibly warm. Hand-crocheted in 20% wool and 80 % acrylic blend yarn. It is 16.5 inches (42 cm) tall has about 40 inches (102 cm) in diameter.

This yarn can be washed in a washing machine at a 30 degrees, special hand-wash program, but remember to add softener as wool likes it and lay it flat to dry.

Please ask me for availability if you would like some other colors, colors that can be ordered:
- noir
- lavender lilac
- woodland green
- antique cream
- vanilla cream
- hazelnut brown

name: Lacy Scarf
description:
The most elegant and feminine scarf. Inspired by vintage doily pattern and made using lace-making technique but using chunkier wool. This is definitely the perfect gift for the most important women in your life, wherever it is your mum or your partner or sister. As unique as the design is also the yarn, it is hand-painted and available in multi-shaded or plain color.

This scarf is currently made to order and it can take up to two weeks before shipping. It is about 2m (78") long and 40cm (15") wide.

The yarn is perfect blend of wool and nylon (75% and 25%) and it can be washed in gentle machine washing cycle. No tumble dry, dry flat.

name: Flower Ring in Blue
description:
Funky accessory for all fashionistas, flower with metallic edge on adjustable ring. It fits perfectly to your finger and it has been designed to last long time, even if that is only a crochet one. 

This ring id ready to ship for you and it will be shipped within 24 hours from your order.

It has been made using very durable cotton thread and metallic embroidery thread and is made on silver plated base. It can be ordered on silver ring but it may take up to a week before shipping.  Please remember to take it off when washing your hands as it doesn't like to be soaked, it can only be washed with soft, damp cloth and delicate detergent.

RED ONE is SOLD OUT, but it can be made to order, (up to three weeks to be shipped)

description:

name: Organic Newborn Baby Booties
description:
Beautiful handmade 100% pure cotton baby slippers. They have tiny wooden button attached for fastening.

Sizes available:
newborn
0 - 3 months
3 - 6 months
6 - 9 months

Please let me know what size would you like and if you like them in any other color.

Please remember also that the button is attached really firmly but can always cause a hazard for the baby so it cannot be left on his own. If you'd like I can make them without the button with strings attached for fastening.

name: Baby Booties With a Flower
description:
Beautiful handmade 100% pure cotton baby slippers. They have been decorated with a crocheted flower. The flower can be made in the same or different color than the body of the booties.

Sizes available
0 - 3 months
3 - 6 months
6 - 9 months

Please let me know what size would you like and what color is your first choice (for the body of the slipper) and second choice - this will be the flower attached to the slipper. Do not hesitate to contact me if you like them in any other color.

Please remember also that the flower is attached really firmly but can always cause a hazard for the baby so it cannot be left on his own.

Thank you for stopping by!

name: Cashmere Fingerless MIttens with Flower in Light Sea Blue
description:
Hand crocheted with a merino, silk and cashmere blend and adorned with high quality mohair. They are very elegant and will keep your hands warm even when using a phone. Perfect for the evening out dress up, but also great for everyday wear.

Soft merino yarn 75%, silk 5% and cashmere 10%, mohair edge. Please hand wash only, use a conditioner and lay flat to dry.

They are usually in one size to fit average size hand, but can be made much smaller or bigger.

THIS PAIR IS READY TO SHIP WITHIN 5 DAYS FROM THE PURCHASE

name: Barefoot Sandals - Made to order
description:
Something light, something pretty, crocheted lacy adornment for your feet. Take them for your holiday and wear it at the pool. This could make a perfect accessory to a wedding on the beach, or sand where you don't want to wear any heels or absolutely nothing on your feet. sole less, footwear, beach sandals, triangular foot accessory, sand sandals

one size fits all

Triangles with 4.5" (11cm) sides.

I can make them in any color you like, just sent me a message.

I designed them and made them myself and I have the pattern available for sale if you would like to make them yourself:

http://izabelamotyl.bigcartel.com/product/pattern-crochet-sandals-pdf-file

I hope you enjoy wearing your sandals.
